pr_title: LUCENE-9176: Handle the case when there is only one leaf node in TestEstimatePointCount

timeline.message: Handle the case when there is only one leaf node

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this line needs to change, we already get a number of leaves equal to 1 when there are fewer points than number of points per leaf?
timeline.author: jpountz

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are right, I reverted that change.
replies.author: iverase
